declaration.credit_card:
Payment Sucharge Fees: A credit/debit card surcharge of 1.5% (inc. GST) applies for Visa and Mastercard, 3% surcharge (inc GST) applies for AMEX and Diners Card. Please check our Terms and Conditions
  • the debit payment will be based on the bills issued according to each bill cycle
declaration.bank_account:
Payment Dishonor Fees: A dishonor fee of $15.00 (inc GST) applied for failed direct debt.
  • the bank payment will be based on the bills issued according to each bill cycle. Please check our Terms and Conditions

move_in.introduction: This agreement authorises Blue Oak Solutions Pty Ltd (BlueOak) to manage the supply of your electricity and/or utilities. For any help completing this form or to setup a direct debit facility please call our office on 1300 584 628 during business hours. If your residence does not currently have power, it may take up to three business days to re-connect your power. Terms and Conditions

supply_state.introduction: This is a test introduction for Supply Connected

attachments.text:
Please upload all site plans and work drawings below. We will review all the documentation provided and be in contact to arrange a site inspection before permit is issued.

You can review our trade waste pricing here.

credit_card: Move-In DD I/We hereby authorise to debit my/our credit card on behalf of

through the payment gateway as per the service agreement provided and agree to the the following
  • the debit payment will be based on the bills issued according to each bill cycle
  • the amount debited may vary
  • prior to the first debit payment, we will advise you in writing of the first bill to be debited under your direct debit drawing arrangement
bank_account: Move-In DD I/We hereby authorise SR Global Solutions Pty Ltd ACN 132 951 172 ("Merchant Warrior"), Direct Debit User ID Number 397351, to debit my/our account on behalf of

through the Bulk Electronic Clearing System (BECS) as per the service agreement provided and agree to the the following
  • the debit payment will be based on the bills issued according to each bill cycle
  • the amount debited may vary
  • prior to the first debit payment, we will advise you in writing of the first bill to be debited under your direct debit drawing arrangement

concession.not_available: We cannot apply concession directly to your account. However, please consult our comprehensive online guide that walks you through how to go about claiming your concession directly from the appropriate government organisation.

authorisation.text:
'Company' is seeking your consent to collect and use your name, address, payment and concession card information from the Department of Human Services/Department of Veteran Affairs to validate your concession eligibility. This authority is only effective for the period that you are a customer of 'Company' and you can revoke your consent at any time by contacting us. If you do not provide your consent you may not be eligible for the concession. You are required to notify us and your card issuer of any changes in your circumstances which may affect your eligibility for a concession.

Do you understand and consent to 'Company' accessing your information held by the Department of Human Services/Department of Veteran Affairs? Visit our Terms and Conditions

acceptance.text: I/We confirm the above details are accurate and by clicking submit I understand an account will be setup with these details
I/We agree to the Terms and Conditions and also acknowledge BlueOak's Standard Fee Schedule
I/We will add enquiries@blueoak.com.au to my email contacts or white list where required

move_out.introduction: The below online form notifies Blue Oak Solution Pty Ltd (BlueOak) that you are moving out of a property that BlueOak supplies electricity and/or utilities. We'll process your disconnection request and send any further communication including a final bill to your new address. If you wish to use BlueOak as your electricity supplier for your new address, you can also do this through the form below

notification.introduction: Paper bills put upward pressure on prices so we encourage you to use our eBilling service.

postal_address.text: We require a forwarding address to be provided to ensure your final bill is delivered promptly

acceptance.text: I/We confirm the above details are accurate and by clicking submit I understand an account will be setup with these details
I/We agree to the Terms and Conditions and also acknowledge BlueOak's Standard Fee Schedule.
I/We have added enquiries@blueoak.com.au to my email contacts or white list where required

connection.introduction: This agreement authorises Blue Oak Solutions Pty Ltd (BlueOak) to manage the supply of your electricity and/or utilities. For any help completing this form or to setup a direct debit facility please call our office on 1300 584 628 during business hours. If your residence does not currently have power, it may take up to three business days to re-connect your power. Please check our Terms and Conditions
